intro: Eurystyles lobata, commonly known as the lobate eurystyle, is a species of flowering plant in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its compound leaves with lobed margins and small, white to pale yellow flowers arranged in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as woodlands and stream banks. Its root system is fibrous and often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits. The species is native to regions of Southeast Asia, including parts of India and China.
